label: Sinai Georgian NF M 71, Undertext (Christian Palestinian Aramaic)

note: Early small CPA. Typical hand of Cyril of Jerusalem scribe

note.value: Original text in two columns extends over conjoint folios. Only the bottom half of each original folio is preserved

Belongs to the same manuscript as Codex Sinaiticus Rescriptus St. Petersburg i = Syr. no. 16; Codex Sinaiticus Zosimi Rescriptus (CSZR) III = Oslo, Martin Schøyen MS 35; 37; Sinai Georgian NF M 19. Reconstructed order is as follows: 1.
